{"id":1238871458,"question_id":3404,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1713773789,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1238871458/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Satisfy Conditions","memory":"203.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumOperations(int[][] grid) {\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        int[][] dp = new int[w][10];\n        for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n            int[] cnt = new int[10];\n            for(int i = 0; i < h; i++) {\n                cnt[grid[i][j]]++;\n            }\n            for(int k = 0; k < 10; k++) {\n                dp[j][k] = h-cnt[k];\n            }\n        }\n\n        int[][] dpp = new int[w][10];\n        for(int k=0; k<10; k++) dpp[0][k] = dp[0][k];\n\n        for(int j=1; j<w; j++) {\n            for(int k = 0; k < 10; k++) {\n                int min = 1000000;\n                for(int q = 0; q < 10; q++) {\n                    if(q!=k) min = Math.min(min, dpp[j-1][q]);\n                }\n                dpp[j][k] = min + dp[j][k];\n            }\n        }\n        int ans = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int k=0; k<10; k++) ans = Math.min(ans, dpp[w-1][k]);\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-satisfy-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
